name: MEMessageEncodingResult
desc: An object that contains a signed or encrypted message, or errors that indicate failure to encode the message.

items.name: init(encodedMessage: MEEncodedOutgoingMessage?, signingError: Error?, encryptionError: Error?)
items.desc: Creates an encoding result object with a signed or encrypted message, or errors if the message encoder fails to encode the message.

items.name: var encodedMessage: MEEncodedOutgoingMessage?
items.desc: A signed or encrypted message, if the message security handler needs to encode the message.

items.name: var encryptionError: Error?
items.desc: An error that occurred while the message encoder encrypted the message.

items.name: var signingError: Error?
items.desc: An error that occurred while the message encoder signed the message.
